testcase.name: User should be able to get capital of the country
testcase.system-out: * url "http://webservices.oorsprong.org/websamples.countryinfo/CountryInfoService.wso?WSDL" . passed Given request ............................................................. passed And soap action 'CapitalCity' ............................................. passed And status 200 ............................................................ passed And print response ........................................................ passed And match response contains '<m:CapitalCityResult>New Delhi</m:CapitalCityResult>' . passed And match responseHeaders['Content-Type'][*] contains 'text/xml; charset=utf-8' . passed And assert responseTime < 3000 ............................................ passed
